sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_attachment ( id char(32) not null, contentid char(32) not null, md5 char(32) not null, topic varchar(128) not null, attachtype varchar(16), attachsize bigint not null, downloads int not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );
